original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṁ nigrodhārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmin nigrodha ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhunupassayaṁ upasaṅkamitvā chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ovadanti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū bhikkhun upassayam upasaṅkamitvā chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ ovadanti

original: “Yampi mayaṁ, ayye, gaccheyyāma ovādassa kāraṇā, ayyā chabbaggiyā idheva āgantvā amhe ovadantī”ti.
analyzed: yam pi maya ayye gaccheyyāma ovādassa kāraṇā ayyā chabbaggiyā idha iva āgantvā amhe ovadanti iti

original: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhunupassayaṁ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadissantī”ti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū bhikkhun upassayam upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyaḥ ovadissanti iti

original: Atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo bhikkhūnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
analyzed: atha kho tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ bhikkhūnam etam attham ārocesu

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: ye te bhikkhū appicchā pe te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhunupassayaṁ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadissantī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū bhikkhun upassayam upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyaḥ ovadissanti iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, bhikkhunupassayaṁ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadathā”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira tumhe bhikkhave bhikkhuni passayam upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyaḥ ovadatha ati

original: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, bhikkhunupassayaṁ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadissatha.
analyzed: katham hi nāma tumhe moghapurisāḥ bhikkhunu passayam upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyaḥ ovadissatha
neta moghapurisāḥ appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhunupassayaṁ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu bhikkhuni passayam upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyaḥ ovadeyya pācittiyan ti

original: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
analyzed: evañca idam bhagavatā bhikkhūnam sikkhāpadam paññattam hoti

original: Tena kho pana samayena mahāpajāpati gotamī gilānā hoti.
analyzed: tena khalu pana samayena mahāpajāpati gotamī gilānā hoti

original: Therā bhikkhū yena mahāpajāpati gotamī tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
analyzed: therāḥ bhikkhū yena mahāpajāpati gotamī tena upasaṅkamisu
na me ayyā khamanīyam na yāpanīya

original: “Na, bhagini, kappati bhikkhunupassayaṁ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo dhammaṁ desetun”ti kukkuccāyantā na desesuṁ.
analyzed: na bhagini kappati bhikkhunu passayam upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyaḥ dhammam desetun ti kukkuccāyantā na desesu

original: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena mahāpajāpati gotamī tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya yena mahāpajāpati gotamī tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi

original: Nisajja kho bhagavā mahāpajāpatiṁ gotamiṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: nisajja khalu bhagavā mahāpajāpatim gotamim etat avoca

original: “Pubbe me, bhante, therā bhikkhū āgantvā dhammaṁ desenti.
analyzed: pubbe me bhante therāḥ bhikkhū āgantvā dhammaṃ desenti

original: Idāni pana—‘bhagavatā paṭikkhittan’ti, kukkuccāyantā na desenti.
analyzed: idāni pana bhagavatā kukkuccāyantāḥ na desenti
tena me na phāsu hoti iti

original: Atha kho bhagavā mahāpajāpatiṁ gotamiṁ dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṁsetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā mahāpajāpatim gotamim dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahasetvā uṭṭhāya āsanā pakkāmi

original: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā etasmim nidāne etasmim pakaraṇe dhammim katham katvā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, bhikkhunupassayaṁ upasaṅkamitvā gilānaṁ bhikkhuniṁ ovadituṁ.
analyzed: anujānāmi bhikkhave bhikkhuni passayam upasaṅkamitvā gilānam bhikkhunim ovaditu

original: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhunupassayaṁ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadeyya, aññatra samayā, pācittiyaṁ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu bhikkhuni passayam upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyaḥ ovadeyya aññatra samayā pācittiya

original: Tatthāyaṁ samayo. Gilānā hoti bhikkhunī—ayaṁ tattha samayo”ti.
analyzed: tattha ayam samayaḥ gilānā hoti bhikkhunī ayam tattha samayaḥ ti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetaḥ bhikkhu iti
yattha bhikkhuniyaḥ eka rattam pi vasanti
aṭṭhahi garu dhammehi ovadati āpatti pācittiyassa

original: na sakkoti ovādāya vā saṁvāsāya vā gantuṁ.
analyzed: na sakkoti ovādāya vā sa vāsāya vā gantu

original: Upasampannāya upasampannasaññī bhikkhunupassayaṁ upasaṅkamitvā aññatra samayā ovadati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: upasampannāya upasampanna saññī bhikkhu upassayam upasaṅkamitvā aññatra samayā ovadati āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Upasampannāya vematiko bhikkhunupassayaṁ upasaṅkamitvā aññatra samayā ovadati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: upasampannāya vematikaḥ bhikkhu upassayam upasaṅkamitvā aññatra samayā ovadati āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Upasampannāya anupasampannasaññī bhikkhunupassayaṁ upasaṅkamitvā aññatra samayā ovadati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: upasampannāya anupasampanna saññī bhikkhu upassayam upasaṅkamitvā aññatra samayā ovadati āpatti pācittiyassa
an upasampannāya upasampanna saññī āpatti dukkaṭassa
an upasampannāya an upasampanna saññī anāpatti
